title: Digital Marketing Specialist
job_overview:
Are you passionate about all things design, branding, and digital magic?
Do you thrive in a fast-paced virtual world where creativity meets strategy?
We’re on the hunt for a creative powerhouse who’s ready to bring bold ideas to life, elevate digital presence, and make brands pop!

If you’re detail-driven, digitally savvy, and bursting with fresh ideas — this is your Upgrade to see actual infont.
Ready to make your mark?
Join our team and let’s create something amazing together!

At The Guiding Star LLC, we’re all about helping businesses grow and we believe that starts
with a strong digital presence. As our Digital Marketing Specialist, you’ll be at the forefront of
that mission, creating stunning visuals, managing our website, and elevating our social media
presence.

Key Responsibilities:
Website Management
Keep our website fresh, functional, and on-brand
Update content and ensure pages are responsive, attractive, and SEO-optimized
Collaborate with internal teams to align web content with marketing goals

Graphic Design
Design eye-catching visuals for web, social, and marketing campaigns
Use tools like Canva, Adobe Photoshop, and Illustrator to deliver polished
materials
Maintain brand consistency across all platforms

Social Media Management
Plan, create, and schedule content across platforms (Instagram, Facebook,
LinkedIn, etc.)
Track engagement and analytics to optimize performance
Stay ahead of digital trends, reels, and viral content formats
Build and grow our social media presence with creativity and consistency

Minimum technical requirements:
Processor (CPU): Intel Core i5 (10th gen or newer) or AMD Ryzen 5 (3000 series
or newer)
RAM: 8 GB minimum (16 GB recommended)
Storage: 256 GB SSD (minimum)
Operating System: Windows 10/11 (Pro or Home) or macOS
Webcam & Microphone: 720p HD webcam and external microphone or headset
with noise cancellation for clear communication

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing or a related field
3–5 years of experience in marketing, design, or as a digital assistant
Strong background in website content management
Proficiency with graphic design tools such as Canva and Adobe Creative Suite
Solid experience in managing social media content and developing strategy
Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal
Highly organized, self-motivated, and detail-oriented

Benefits:
100% Remote Work – Enjoy the freedom to create from anywhere
Flexible Setup – Work on your terms, with the tools you love
Creative Impact – Bring your ideas to life and shape our brand’s identity
Career Growth – Room to lead, innovate, and build a standout portfolio
Supportive Team – Collaborate with people who care about your success

How to Apply
Apply here and help us build meaningful connections that fuel success!
Pro Tip: Be ready to showcase 3 sample works (e.g., social media designs, website layouts, or marketing materials) during your interview—we want to see your creativity in action!

Please note: We do not accept applications on this platform.
